Producer: Jason Blum, Marc Toberoff, Jeff Wadlow
Screenwriter: Jeff Wadlow, Christopher Roach, Jillian Jacobs
Synopsis: The enigmatic Mr. Roarke makes the secret dreams of his guests come true at a luxurious tropical resort. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the visitors must soon solve the island's mystery in order to escape with their lives.
Title: Blumhouse's Fantasy Island
